item.title: Your Application At The Edge [S01E03]
item.description: Intro This blog post will cover the details on how to deliver your Website or Application using the Akamai Edge Platform as the CDN infrastructure. Whatâ€™s Hot? Have you checked the previous Your Application at the Edge [S01E02] blog post? It explains how you can use NS as an origin. Context As described in the previous post, Figure 1 shows the end-to-end architecture in which we have the origins (on the left-hand side), the Akamai Edge Platform (in the middle), and the end-users (on the right-hand side).
